text:
In some of my testing situations, the source address of a request can make a
difference, so I have patched ab to add a new -b option (named after the similar
option in OpenSSH).

I will attach the patch against ab.c from 2.0.52 to this ticket.
creator: gauze@omnimental.tmetic.com

text:
Created attachment 13644
Patch to add -b (source address) option to ab
creator: gauze@omnimental.tmetic.com
